segments.text: It's very kind of you to come and see us off .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My pleasure.What a pity you have to leave so soon !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We would stay longer . but I've got to attend a meeting tomorrow morning . Thank you for your warm hospitality .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're welcome . Maybe next time we'll come to see you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My wife and I will look forward to it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I promise the next holiday I have we're coming to visit . Oh , what's your flight number ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: lt's Flight No . 302 , Northwest Orient Airlines .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They just announced the boarding call .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then we've got to get going .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Bon voyage and a safe landing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you again for all your help .
segments.speaker: S1
